question: who is the owner of the crowne plaza
vanilla_rag_result: The ownership of the Crowne Plaza has changed multiple times over the years. As of September 2017, the hotel building was sold to EOS DCH Owner LLC, which means they are the current owners of the property that was formerly affiliated with the Crowne Plaza brand. However, it is important to note that the hotel disassociated from the Crowne Plaza brand and became an independent property at that time.
